topics.subject: CS12 Assignment 7
topics.body:
The assignment is hard so go step by step.
You can read the Tips & Tricks part for some help.
Has anyone started already?

children.subject: Re: Your favorite TV show
children.body:
Well the book is one hell of a resource.
And, the script is written very loyal to the text.

children.subject: Re: Your favorite TV show
children.body:
Game of Thrones is an awesome show but there are too 
many characters to remember.
We even did not see half of the families and still at least 20 
important characters are introduced already.
Is there anyplace that I can read about the characters?

children.subject: Re: Your favorite TV show
children.body:
The cat!
Colin Mochrie is hilarious.

children.subject: Re: Your favorite TV show
children.body:
Whose line is it anyway!!!
Too bad, it is no more.

topics.subject: Your favorite TV show
topics.body: So guys, what is your favorite tv show?

topics.subject: Towel Day
topics.body:
Bring your towels on May 25.
See here: http://www.towelday.org/
